tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My entire experience at tooth needs dental clinic was fantastic! Dr Sudha demonstrated exceptional skill and expertise throughout my root canal procedure, making me feel comfortable. The teeth whitening procedure left remarkable results for me leaving me with a smile. The doctor made sure that I was well informed with the procedure and the post procedure care was carefully explained as well.

I appreciate the genuine care that Dr.Sudha and her staff provided throughout my visits. Would definitely recommend for anyone seeking dental care in Hyderabad to visit her clinic!
reply_text: Thank.youn very much for your valuable feed back!

review:
I am new to Hyderabad and did not have a family dentist here, visited Dr Sudha for dental fillings which was getting worse with time and a general checkup. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Invisible/Clear Braces, Tooth Extraction,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Cavity Filling,
review: I visited Dr.Sudha for a regular dental check-up and liked the way she explained my tooth condition. She is very professional, approachable and showed flexibility per my timings. I never knew I had cavities which could get worse if it was not addressed immediately. Dr.Sudha also suggested me about tooth aligners to get my tooth in shape, I liked the concept and went ahead with it. It also required tooth extraction, she was very patient and flexible during the extraction. Overall, I'm happy with Dr.Sudha and would surely recommend her.
